title: Workplace stress can take a toll on your brain surgeon, too

title_detail.value: Workplace stress can take a toll on your brain surgeon, too

summary: A new study finds that two-thirds of neurosurgeons experience burnout during training, and stressors at work are partly to blame.

summary_detail.value: A new study finds that two-thirds of neurosurgeons experience burnout during training, and stressors at work are partly to blame.
